title: Knowledge Circulation Organization Management and E-Learning Content Design: Mathematics Education Specialist Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics theory and understanding of core instructional design principles
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance math education content design and knowledge management competencies. Real-time collaborative learning is supported via an integrated e-learning system in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: They can systematically classify mathematics educational content and integrate it into a knowledge management system using standardized data formats (XML/JSON).
They can implement a collaboration-based content design process in e-learning environments by applying distributed file systems and real-time synchronization technology.
Cultivating the ability to design individualized mathematics educational content by analyzing learner diagnostic data and incorporating it into the knowledge cycle process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
